entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
